name: San Francisco City College Adult Education
description: Free adult education including GED, ESL, citizenship, and career training classes
fullDescription: City College of San Francisco offers free adult education classes including GED preparation, ESL, citizenship, and career training.
whatTheyOffer:
- Free GED and high school diploma preparation
- Free ESL (English as a Second Language) classes
- U.S. Citizenship preparation
- Basic skills and literacy
- Career and technical education
- Computer literacy classes
- Multiple locations throughout San Francisco
howToGetIt:
1. Visit CCSF website or adult education center
2. Take placement test if required
3. Register for classes
4. Classes are free for California residents
5. Flexible schedules including evening and weekend options
keywords: adult school, San Francisco, CCSF, GED, ESL, English, citizenship, high school diploma, adult education, free classes, continuing education
